properties.name: config
properties.description: Whatever should be added to the configuration when a widget is created.
properties.rawdescription: Whatever should be added to the configuration when a widget is created.

properties.name: device
properties.description: The selected device or group (note: naming is inconsistent as group was added later but must stay for already implemented widgets)
properties.rawdescription:
The selected device or group (note: naming is inconsistent as group was added later
but must stay for already implemented widgets)

properties.name: displaySettings
properties.description: Settings that are injected in any displaying component.
properties.rawdescription: Settings that are injected in any displaying component.

properties.name: export
properties.description: Method to export the widget configuration during dashboard export to a json file. It enhances the configuration with additional data that can be used later by the import method to restore the widget configuration in a new context.
properties.rawdescription:
Method to export the widget configuration during dashboard export to a json file. It enhances the configuration with
additional data that can be used later by the `import` method to restore the widget configuration in a new context.

properties.name: import
properties.description: Method to import the widget configuration during dashboard import from a json file. It restores the widget configuration with data exported by the export method.
properties.rawdescription:
Method to import the widget configuration during dashboard import from a json file. It restores the widget configuration
with data exported by the `export` method.

properties.name: settings
properties.description: Settings that define how the default config component is displayed. They are static and will not be saved.
properties.rawdescription:
Settings that define how the default config component is
displayed. They are static and will not be saved.

indexSignatures.rawdescription: Any other information that should be stored here.
indexSignatures.description: Any other information that should be stored here.
